summary: The Supreme Court of India has ruled that a retired railway employee who opted out of the pension scheme was not entitled to a refund of his contributions. In his order dated 15.5.2004, the Chairman of the National Green Tribunal (NGT) has held that an employee who had eight occasions to come over to the pension scheme during his service period was not entitled to the benefit.
